IEntitySerializable.Name: Use Celcius
IEntitySerializable.Description: Enable to use celcius (°C) for temperature - disable to use kelvin (K). (0 K = -273.15 °C, +1 K -> +1 °C)

IEntitySerializable.Name: Use Pascal
IEntitySerializable.Description: Enable to show pressure as pascal (Pa) - disable to show as newtons per meter squared (N/m²). (1 Pa = 1 N/m²)
